title: Understanding Mechanical Properties
text: Mechanical properties of materials, such as strength, ductility, and hardness, are typically studied using specific types of analysis. Consider what these properties entail and how they are measured.

title: Types of Analysis
text: There are several types of analysis in chemistry and materials science, including qualitative, quantitative, and characterization. Think about which type focuses on the physical attributes of a material.

title: Characterization Analysis
text: Characterization analysis is used to study the physical and mechanical properties of materials. It involves techniques that provide information about the structure, composition, and properties of the material.
